name: Lance Master
description:
Controller preferred, but keyboard is supported too.
The lance is thrown in the direction of movement.

Controller: Primary button to throw lance.
Keyboard: Space to throw lance.

Do you want to become the Lance Master? No strings attached... except to your lance. Your method of fighting is throwing the lance and launching yourself with it, like a certain popular god. But wait! You are haunted by burning arrows following your every dash. Fight your way through enemies with your trusty weapon, and avoid killing yourself with the arrows following your dashes.

This is a submission for the GMTK game jam 2021.
